post.body: chinese food at mikes and then Ice Cube with mark...cuz I wasn't going to finish this work tonight anyway.
coffee at 10PM...what am i, in college?
i forgot that universities were whores for your money...
early night tonight...not for lack of things to do but certainly for lack of motivation
is wondering if it was the lady on top of the christmas tree that stole his christmas spirit...or his christmas ornament...yikes
a beautiful sunday spent entirely indoors doing work...11 days to winston-salem
a bag of frozen vegetables for the shoulder...and then i can sleep tonight
top chef...saving a stressful wednesday
its a cold monday evening...wow, new orleans sucks
pretty sure i partially tore my rotator cuff...i guess there is no teacher DL to be put on...damn
teaching in new orleans is not one of the things i like...but the red sox still are
new orleans on a monday night...so sweet you can almost taste new england
Sick to my stomach
I certainly am not thinking about new orleans on this beautiful new england thursday night.
snow = utter madness at ATA...even in a school with no windows.
ice cube pointed directly at me tonight...lets get this gangsta rap on
im more screwed than i thought...at least winter break starts in 36 hours....
three half days between me and break...and by three i clearly mean two
its perhaps fitting that all this pressure would lead to writer's block...close to calling a quits for this evening...or not.
a busy sunday...but at least its the last sunday i have to spend in NOLA in 2008!!!
ata christmas party usually means open bar and line dancing...sweet
now the only thing separating me from holden caulfield is a transcendental experience
christmas eve...i think im done with my shopping finally
as excited as i am to be in the northeast...jazzfest lineup is up...and im pretty pumped about being in NOLA for that
what a productive wednesday...if only that included my grad school stuff
